page.title: 15Gymkhana
page.content: Each year Kilsby Church holds its major money raising ecevnt. It is held in Mr.Thomas' field. People bring their horses and dogs from miles around. There is a big beer and refreshment tent. The horses can be in different competitions. There is a jumping competition, a race weaving around posts and competitions for the best presented horse. The people of Kilsby set up a lot of different side shows. There are skittles, throwing the sack of hay, horse shoe on the spike and various other stalls such as cakes and plants. The profits are usually in the region of Â£1000 to Â£1500. This money helps to run St.Faiths for another year. Any extra income will go towards the church restoration fund. This year it rained but we still made a lot of money.
